name: Holy Night Sky
text: During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Holy Night" monster or Level 7 LIGHT Dragon monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) During your turn, if a face-up Level 7 LIGHT Dragon monster(s) you control returns to the hand: You can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Holy Night Sky" once per turn.
